div.style: display: flex; align-items: center; flex-direction: column
display: flex; position: relative; align-items: center; flex-direction: row; justify-content: center
display: flex; position: relative; margin-top: {firstMarginTop}; margin-bottom: 4px; align-items: center; flex-direction: row
display: flex; position: relative; align-items: center; flex-direction: row
display: flex; align-items: flex-start; flex-direction: column; margin-top: -1px; margin-right: 10px; white-space: nowrap
display: {firstLabelLineDisplay}; position: relative; align-items: center; flex-direction: row; white-space: normal

img.style: display: flex; width: 32px; height: 32px; margin-right: 6px; align-self: center

div.style: display: {firstLabelDisPlay}; box-sizing: border-box; align-items: center; flex-direction: row; margin-right: 6px; border-radius: 8px; background-color: {firstLabelBgColor}; padding: 1px 6px

label.style: margin-left: 4px; line-height: 24px; white-space: nowrap; color: #FFFFFF; font-size: 24px; font-weight: bold; margin-right: 2px; align-self: center

div.style: display: {secondLabelDisPlay}; box-sizing: border-box; align-items: flex-start; flex-direction: row; border-radius: 8px; background-color: {secondLabelBgColor}; padding: 1px 6px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 28px; white-space: nowrap

label.style: color: {secondLabelColor}; font-size: 24px; margin-right: 2px; font-weight: bold; align-self: flex-start

div.style: display: flex; position: relative; align-items: center; flex-direction: row; white-space: normal

img.style: display: {secondIconDisplay}; width: 32px; height: 32px; margin-right: 6px; align-self: center

label.style: position: relative; margin-top: 2px; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; line-height: 28px; color: {etaInfoColor}; font-size: 24px; font-weight: bold; align-self: flex-start

div.style: display: {chargeInfoDisPlay}; position: relative; align-items: center; flex-direction: row; margin-top: 3px; line-height: 24px
display: {quickChargeInfoDisPlay}; align-items: center; flex-direction: row; margin-right: 6px; border-radius: 8px; background-color: {quickChargeInfoBgColor}

label.style: margin-left: 6px; color: {quickChargeInfo1Color}; font-size: 24px; font-weight: normal; align-self: center
color: {quickChargeInfo2Color}; font-size: 24px; font-weight: normal; margin-right: 6px; align-self: center

div.style: display: {slowChargeInfoDisPlay}; align-items: center; flex-direction: row; border-radius: 8px; background-color: {slowChargeInfoBgColor}

label.style: margin-left: 6px; color: {slowChargeInfo1Color}; font-size: 24px; font-weight: normal; align-self: center
color: {slowChargeInfo2Color}; font-size: 24px; font-weight: normal; margin-right: 6px; align-self: center

div.style: display: {normalInfoDisPlay}; position: relative; align-items: center; flex-direction: row; margin-top: 3px; white-space: pre

display: {firstInfoDisPlay}; box-sizing: border-box; align-items: flex-start; flex-direction: row; margin-right: 6px; border-radius: 8px; background-color: {firstInfoBgColor}; padding-right: 6px; padding-left: 6px; line-height: 28px

label.style: color: {firstInfoColor}; font-size: 24px; font-weight: normal; margin: 1px 6px; align-self: flex-start
display: {secondInfoDisPlay}; line-height: {secondInfoSize}; color: {secondInfoColor}; font-size: {secondInfoSize}; font-weight: {secondInfoWeight}; align-self: center

div.style: display: flex; align-items: center; flex-direction: row;
display: flex; align-items: center; flex-direction: row; padding-top: {paddingTop}px; padding-bottom: {paddingBottom}px
